summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of a grant agreement with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for financial assistance under the Troops to COPS Program which will reimburse training expenses; accepting the money when received; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1995 Budget of the Police Department and making an appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
